method.name: TurnFlashOn
method.comment: Turn the camera flash ON (in TORCH MODE) You need to add the following to the manifest file of the B4A project: AddPermission("android.permission.CAMERA") Example: Dim myflash as flash log(myflash.TurnFlashOn(True))

method.name: TurnFlashOff
method.comment: Turn OFF the camera flash (that is in TORCH MODE) You need to add the following to the manifest file of the B4A project: AddPermission("android.permission.CAMERA") Example: Dim myflash as flash Log(mf.TurnFlashOff)
